info.name: Manga Reader Lite
info.description:
Making MangaReader.net cleaner.
Many options to let you chose exactly what you want to hide.
Can also wipe everything except the image.
info.additionalInfo:
"Reading only" will hide everything except the image.

Updates :
- 12/25/14 : Manga name no longer use a separate line

settings.label: Force image height (width x 1,417 to keep ratio)
